about_the_game:
oath: eimi demo by vai5000
the demo album player for oath, this demo gives you a taste of what's available in the full game.
Listen to 10 tracks using the in-built music player, or explore the demo room that has special content that will tie into your experience with the full game.

oath: eimi demo's features include:

  • Album player: a built-in music player that lets you listen to eimi anytime from the main menu
  • eimi demo room: a large area that lets you experince a slice of what the full game has to offer.
  • Some small secrets to discover...

Please note: the full game, oath, is required to unlock all achievements in the demo.

content_descriptors.notes: Music included with demo covers mature / emotional themes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: No Native Support
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No Native Support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: oath: eimi demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: No Native Support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No Native Support

short_description: Demo for oath and album player for eimi, by vai5000
